get.summary: Generates a ZIP archive with all the documents relevant to the
get.description:
`ReviewRequest.post()` arguments sent. The archive is returned as
the response payload, and it should trigger a download prompt from
the browser.

This response's content is streamed, so there's no `Content-Length`
header present (we can't tell the final size from the start). This
might trigger spurious warnings about MIME types and document type
mismatch in some browsers, but so far those are safe to ignore.

post.summary: Search for and return one or more documents

num_terms_limit.description: The max number of terms to send over

post.summary: Generates a XLSX workbook with document metadata using the same
post.description:
`ReviewRequest.post()` arguments. The workbook data is returned as
the response payload, and it should trigger a download prompt from
the browser.

date_to.description: The latest email date to filter on

reviewers.description: List of reviewers to filter by

page_size.description: The number of results to paginate.

date_from.description: The earliest email date to filter on

model_ids.description: List of model ids to focus on

post.summary: Returns an object with a single key: `download_params`, which is a
post.description:
mapping to be used as query string parameters for the

export filters, expiration and signature, so they must be used verbatim.

email.description: The email address for the user.

get.summary: Fetches the list of users registered in the system

post.summary: Creates and assigns the DiscoCaseAdmin and DiscoCaseUser roles to all org admins for the
post.description:
specified org. Creates the org if it does not already exist, and creates an org admin if
one does not already exist.

org_description.description: org description, only required when an org with the specified domain does not exist

org_admin_username.description: org admin username, only required when no org admins exist for the specified domain

org_admin_password.description: org admin password, only required when no org admins exist for the specified domain

post.summary: Resets the password, given the matching user token

reset_token.description: The token required to set the password

password.description: The desired password for the user

post.summary: Modifies the specified user and returns the updated user

email.description: The email address for the user.

roles.description: The roles this user should have

is_disabled.description: If true, prevents the user from logging in

should_reset.description: If true, requires the user to set their password on next login

get.summary: Fetches the user for a specifc user key

post.summary: Resets the password, given the matching user token

force_reset.description: If the user should set a new password on next login

password.description: The desired password for the user
